text: @SecPompeo @WHO Almost as bad as a President claiming that #COVID19 is a Democratic hoax and it’s fake news, then refuses test kits from WHO. And  he praised China’s response #TrumpOwnsEveryDeath https://t.co/pn4NLq1ne2
